description: I. Letter dated 02/04/2008 from Ed Balls MP to Philip Hunter, Schools Adjudicator, regarding concerns about compliance with the Schools Admissions Code and admissions legislation. 2 p. II. Draft amendments to the Education and Skills Bill with explanatory note. 18 p. III. Verified results of non-compliance with admissions practice from Barnet, Manchester and Northamptonshire local authorities. 7 p. IV. Primary and secondary school admissions and appeals: a guide for parents. 28 p.
department: Dept for Children Schools and Families
